Yet another person told me he can not find talent. He interviewed about¬† 50 candidates for a position and none of them worked out.
My thinking - if you interviewed¬† 50 people and did not hire someone, that start by looking in the mirror.
Maybe you took¬† too long to get back, maybe you did not explained how the job would benefit them, maybe you are not prepared to pay market rates, maybe you did not treat candidates with respect.
You are not in a shopping mall. People are not products.
